thread.title: One Night in Paris. Brilliant hotel for location and value for money
thread.title_full: One Night in Paris. Brilliant hotel for location and value for money - Review of Hotel Les Jardins de Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: michaelzC3579TM
title: One Night in Paris. Brilliant hotel for location and value for money
text:
Visited Paris many times, always stay in a new hotel. This is the best I've stayed in so far in regard to price for location ratio.
The staff were friendly, room large, bed even more so.
I highly recommend for the budget top end.
